tha-ap246:0.3_0: Hearing this corners, the senior monks,
tha-ap246:1.1_0: With the utter ending of all defilements,
tha-ap246:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap246:3.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap246:4.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Vaḍḍha.
tha-ap246:5.1_0: with flowers, for the senior of flowers,
